entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

Temperature: -4.0°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 50 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
